title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.15 - Stopping, standing or parking
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.15 - Stopping, standing or parking

State Regulations

Vehicles shall not stop, stand or park in or upon the bridges
except: (a) when necessary to avoid
injury or damage to persons or property, (b) in compliance with the direction of an
employee of the commission or traffic signal, or
(c) while paying tolls or surrendering toll
receipts, or
(d) during the time
when the gates at the Rouses Point Bridge are closed for the purpose of opening
or closing the draw; provided, however, that vehicles may be parked in such
places as may be designated by the commission. Notes

654.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
